mapper.update: update consumer set con_name = #{conName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, con_sexual = #{conSexual,jdbcType=INTEGER}, us_id = #{usId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, con_password = #{conPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, con_phone = #{conPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, con_birth = #{conBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, con_address = #{conAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, con_remarks = #{conRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where con_id = #{conId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select con_id, con_name, con_sexual, us_id, con_password, con_phone, con_birth, con_address, con_remarks from consumer where con_id = #{conId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select con_id, con_name, con_sexual, us_id, con_password, con_phone, con_birth, con_address, con_remarks from consumer
